places_with_reviews.name: CHITHRAPURI Heritage Hotel

reviews.text: Ambience is awesome. Best service. Very tasty food. Different experience. You have to try it once. Vehicle parking, homely atmosphere,etc. I love this place 😍😍😍😍😍

It is a beautiful place to unwind with the traditional vibe to take you back to the olden times. Loved the place and the ambience. However the restaurant staff could do  better job..they seemed confused and were not able to manage our large group.

The worst place I’ve stayed in my life! WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME.
BEWARE OF THESE SCAMMERS
Checked into 3 rooms with family - around 6pm they blasted music right outside our rooms and when we asked them to be considerate the manager was so RUDE and INCONSIDERATE. Customer service is non existent here
Also if you are with family and little kids - I would definitely not recommend this place from a safety perspective as well. Random people have access to rooms/ area we were in.
Food was also below average

I really loved the place where the resort  is located, the staffs were very good and hardworking especially the GM. His service was so excellent. However, the food disappointed me. I did expect a great taste but it was not really good enough to enjoy.

I recently celebrated my son's birthday at Chitra Puri, and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience. The service was impeccable—attentive and prompt, making us feel truly special. The ambiance created for the occasion was warm and inviting, turning a meal into a memorable celebration. The manager's positive attitude and personal touch added an extra layer of joy to the evening. The overall vibes of the restaurant made it a perfect choice for such a special day. Thank you, Chitrapuri, for making my son's birthday truly extraordinary
